means: [医]夏枯草属：一属唇形科的植物。滁洲夏枯草(P.vulgaris)是一种收敛剂与滋补药

sentence.Network_en: She is a woman to whom personal comforts are leather and prunella.
sentence.Network_cn: 她是一个不讲求个人舒适的人.

sentence.Network_en: Since then, they planted prunella and treated the common people with the herb.
sentence.Network_cn: 后来, 父子二人广种夏枯草,为民治病,深得人心.

derivation.yuyuan_name: modern Latin, literally quinsy', in medieval Latin brunella, diminutive of brunus 'brown', denoting a disease causing a brown coating on the tongue. Self-heal was a reputed cure for the disease
mid 17th cent.: perhaps from French prunelle 'sloe' (because of its dark colour)

means.word_mean: 1. small genus of perennial mostly Eurasian having terminal spikes of small purplish or white flowers
